verses.verse: Wherefore <WG1352> thou art<WG1488> without excuse<WG379>, O<WG5599> man<WG444>, whosoever thou art<WG3956> that judgest<WG2919>: for<WG1063> wherein1722, 3739 thou judges<WG2919> another<WG2087>, thou condemnest<WG2632> thyself<WG4572>; for<WG1063> thou<WG846> that judgest<WG2919> dost practise the same things<WG4238>.
And <WG1161> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> the judgment<WG2917> of God<WG2316> is<WG2076> according to<WG2596> truth<WG225> against<WG1909> them that practise<WG4238> such things<WG5108>.

And <WG1161> reckonest<WG3049> thou this<WG5124>, O<WG5599> man<WG444>, who judgest<WG2919> them that practise<WG4238> such things<WG5108>, and<WG2532> doest<WG4160> the same<WG846>, that<WG3754> thou<WG4771> shalt escape<WG1628> the judgment<WG2917> of God<WG2316>?

Or <WG2228> despisest<WG2706> thou the riches<WG4149> of his<WG846> goodness<WG5544> and<WG2532> forbearance<WG463> and<WG2532> longsuffering<WG3115>, not knowing<WG50> that<WG3754> the goodness<WG5543> of God<WG2316> leadeth<WG71> thee<WG4571> to<WG1519> repentance<WG3341>?

but <WG1161> after<WG2596> thy<WG4675> hardness<WG4643> and<WG2532> impenitent<WG279> heart<WG2588> treasurest up<WG2343> for thyself<WG4572> wrath<WG3709> in<WG1722> the day<WG2250> of wrath<WG3709> and<WG2532> revelation<WG602> of the righteous judgment<WG1341> of God<WG2316>;
who <WG3739> will render<WG591> to every man<WG1538> according to<WG2596> his<WG846> works<WG2041>:
to them<WG3588> that by<WG2596> patience<WG5281> in<WG18> well-doing<WG2041> seek for<WG2212> glory<WG1391> and<WG2532> honor<WG5092> and<WG2532> incorruption<WG861>, eternal<WG166> life<WG2222>:

but <WG1161> unto them<WG3588> that are factious<WG2052>, and<WG2532> obey<WG544> not the truth<WG225>, but<WG1161> obey<WG3982> unrighteousness<WG93>, shall be wrath<WG3709> and<WG2532> indignation<WG2372>,

tribulation <WG2347> and<WG2532> anguish<WG4730>, upon<WG1909> every<WG3956> soul<WG5590> of man<WG444> that worketh<WG2716> evil<WG2556>, of the Jew<WG2453> first<WG4412>, and<WG5037> also<WG2532> of the Greek<WG1672>;

but <WG1161> glory<WG2532> and honor<WG5092> and<WG2532> peace<WG1515> to every man<WG3956> that worketh<WG2038> good<WG18>, to the Jew<WG2453> first<WG4412>, and<WG5037> also<WG2532> to the Greek<WG1672>:
for <WG1063> there is<WG2076> no<WG3756> respect of persons<WG4382> with<WG3844> God<WG2316>.

For <WG1063> as many as<WG3745> have sinned<WG264> without law<WG460> shall<WG622> also<WG2532> perish<WG622> without the law<WG460>: and<WG2532> as many as<WG3745> have sinned<WG264> under<WG1722> the law<WG3551> shall be judged<WG2919> by<WG1223> the law<WG3551>;
for <WG1063> not<WG3756> the hearers<WG202> of the law<WG3551> are just<WG1342> before<WG3844> God<WG2316>, but<WG235> the doers<WG4163> of the law<WG3551> shall be justified<WG1344>:

(for <WG1063> when<WG3752> Gentiles<WG1484> that have<WG2192> not<WG3361> the law<WG3551> do<WG4160> by nature<WG5449> the things<WG3588> of the law<WG3551>, these<WG3778>, not<WG3361> having<WG2192> the law<WG3551>, are<WG1526> the law<WG3551> unto themselves<WG1438>;

in that<WG3748> they show<WG1731> the work<WG2041> of the law<WG3551> written<WG1123> in<WG1722> their<WG846> hearts<WG2588>, their<WG846> conscience<WG4893> bearing witness<WG4828> therewith<WG2532>, and their thoughts<WG3053> one<WG3342> with another<WG240> accusing<WG2723> or else2228, 2532 excusing them<WG626>);
in <WG1722> the day<WG2250> when<WG3753> God<WG2316> shall judge<WG2919> the secrets<WG2927> of men<WG444>, according<WG2596> to my<WG3450> gospel<WG2098>, by<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>.
But <WG1492> if thou<WG4771> bearest the name<WG2028> of a Jew<WG2453>, and<WG2532> restest<WG1879> upon the law<WG3551>, and<WG2532> gloriest<WG2744> in<WG1722> God<WG2316>,
and <WG2532> knowest<WG1097> his will<WG2307>, and<WG2532> approvest<WG1381> the things that are excellent<WG1308>, being instructed<WG2727> out of<WG1537> the law<WG3551>,
and <WG5037> art confident that<WG3982> thou thyself<WG4572> art<WG1511> a guide<WG3595> of the blind<WG5185>, a light<WG5457> of them<WG3588> that are in<WG1722> darkness<WG4655>,
a corrector<WG3810> of the foolish<WG878>, a teacher<WG1320> of babes<WG3516>, having<WG2192> in<WG1722> the law<WG3551> the form<WG3446> of knowledge<WG1108> and<WG2532> of the truth<WG225>;

thou <WG3588> therefore<WG3767> that teachest<WG1321> another<WG2087>, teachest thou<WG1321> not<WG3756> thyself<WG4572>? thou that preachest<WG2784> a man should not<WG3361> steal<WG2813>, dost thou steal<WG2813>?
thou that sayest<WG3004> a man should not<WG3361> commit adultery<WG3431>, dost thou commit adultery<WG3431>? thou that abhorrest<WG948> idols<WG1497>, dost thou rob temples<WG2416>?
thou who<WG3739> gloriest<WG2744> in<WG1722> the law<WG3551>, through<WG1223> thy transgression<WG3847> of the law<WG3551> dishonorest thou<WG818> God<WG2316>?
For <WG1063> the name<WG3686> of God<WG2316> is blasphemed<WG987> among<WG1722> the Gentiles<WG1484> because<WG1223> of you<WG5209>, even as<WG2531> it is written<WG1125>.

For <WG1063> circumcision<WG4061> indeed<WG3303> profiteth<WG5623>, if<WG1437> thou be a doer<WG4238> of the law<WG3551>: but<WG1161> if<WG1437> thou be<WG1510> a transgressor<WG3848> of the law<WG3551>, thy<WG4675> circumcision<WG4061> is become<WG1096> uncircumcision<WG203>.

If <WG1437> therefore<WG3767> the uncircumcision<WG203> keep<WG5442> the ordinances<WG1345> of the law<WG3551>, shall not<WG3780> his<WG846> uncircumcision<WG203> be reckoned<WG3049> for<WG1519> circumcision<WG4061>?

and <WG2532> shall not<WG2919> the uncircumcision<WG203> which is by<WG1537> nature<WG5449>, if it fulfil<WG5055> the law<WG3551>, judge<WG2919> thee<WG4571>, who<WG3588> with<WG1223> the letter<WG1121> and<WG2532> circumcision<WG4061> art a transgressor<WG3848> of the law<WG3551>?

For <WG1063> he<WG3588> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> a Jew<WG2453> who is one3588, 1722 outwardly<WG5318>; neither<WG3761> is that circumcision<WG1722> which is outward<WG5318> in<WG1722> the flesh<WG4561>:

but <WG235> he<WG3588> is a Jew<WG2453> who is one3588, 1722 inwardly<WG2927>; and<WG2532> circumcision<WG4061> is that of the heart<WG2588>, in<WG1722> the spirit<WG4151> not<WG3756> in the letter<WG1121>; whose<WG3739> praise<WG1868> is not<WG3756> of<WG1537> men<WG444>, but<WG235> of<WG1537> God<WG2316>.
